TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed PagerButtons extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the types of buttons to display for navigating between pages of content in a paginated control.

span.span: Specifies the types of buttons to display for navigating between pages of content in a paginated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉，代表要顯示的已編頁控制項中的內容頁面之間巡覽按鈕的類型。The enumeration represents the types of buttons to display for navigating between pages of content in a paginated control. 這個列舉型別由屬性來指定要顯示在瀏覽按鈕的型別會控制該使用類別，例如和。This enumeration is used by the property to specify the type of navigation buttons to display in controls that use the class, such as and . `PagerButtons.NextPrevious` 顯示**下一步**和**上一步**按鈕來存取已編頁控制項的下一步和前一個頁面。`PagerButtons.NextPrevious` displays **Next** and **Previous** buttons to access the next and previous pages of the paginated control. `PagerButtons.NextPreviousFirstLast` 顯示**下一步**和**上一步**按鈕以及**第一個**和**最後**直接存取的第一個和最後一個頁面的按鈕已編頁的控制項。`PagerButtons.NextPreviousFirstLast` displays **Next** and **Previous** buttons as well as **First** and **Last** buttons to directly access the first and last pages of the paginated control. `PagerButtons.Numeric` 顯示數字連結按鈕對應到已編頁控制項的頁面。`PagerButtons.Numeric` displays numeric link buttons corresponding to the pages of the paginated control. `PagerButtons.NumericFirstLast` 顯示數字連結按鈕對應到已編頁控制項的頁面以及**第一個**和**最後**直接存取已編頁控制項的第一個和最後一個頁面的按鈕。`PagerButtons.NumericFirstLast` displays numeric link buttons corresponding to the pages of the paginated control as well as **First** and **Last** buttons to directly access the first and last pages of the paginated control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerButtons NextPrevious = int32(0)

summary.span: A set of pagination controls consisting of **Previous** and **Next** buttons.

span.span: A set of pagination controls consisting of **Previous** and **Next** buttons.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerButtons NextPreviousFirstLast = int32(2)

summary.span: A set of pagination controls consisting of **Previous**, **Next**, **First**, and **Last** buttons.

span.span: A set of pagination controls consisting of **Previous**, **Next**, **First**, and **Last** buttons.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerButtons Numeric = int32(1)

summary.span: A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered link buttons to access pages directly.

span.span: A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered link buttons to access pages directly.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.PagerButtons NumericFirstLast = int32(3)

summary.span: A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered and **First** and **Last** link buttons.

span.span: A set of pagination controls consisting of numbered and **First** and **Last** link buttons.
